de.dhbw.stress_yourself.extend

Class ModuleClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw.stress_yourself.extend.ModuleClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CaptchaCharSequenceModule, CaptchaCirclesModule, ContinueSequenceModule, KeyPressModule, MathEquationSystemsModule, MathPotenciesModule, MathRuleOfThreeModule, MathSizeUnitsModule, MathSystemsModule, OperandModule, PopupModule

    public abstract class ModuleClass
extends java.lang.Object
    The ModuleClass is an abstract class to predefine some functions and vars for the subclasses.
    Author:
    Moritz Herbert , Tobias Roeding
